title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
ill give you three dialogue options to choose from:

Maybe I'd like to get to know you better. You're deflecting - are you hiding something from me? If you're not comfortable, I won't press you.

Choosing the second option will make her irritated again, and asks if you think your blunt approach would make her confess. Two new dialogue options will be available for you to choose from here:

I suppose not. We can let the matter rest for now, if you'd rather. Blunt's all I have if you keep being so
